tool_description: Creates and structures hierarchical category taxonomies with parent-child relationships and metadata.

category_names.description: List of category names to organize

auto_organize.description: Automatically infer hierarchy from category names

include_metadata.description: Include category metadata like descriptions and attributes

error_messages: Empty category list: Provide at least one category name
Invalid hierarchy depth: max_depth must be between 1 and 10
Circular dependency detected: Parent-child relationships create a loop
Invalid parent-child format: Use 'parent:child' format for relationships
usage: Provide category_names and optionally specify parent_child_pairs. Set max_depth and toggle auto_organize based on your needs.

hierarchy_structure.description: JSON representation of the category hierarchy

total_categories.description: Total number of categories in the hierarchy

max_depth_used.description: Actual maximum depth of the created hierarchy
